Question
========
What does a force push do?

Answerlist
----------
* Adds a new collaborator to the repository
* Overwrites the remote repository with your local version
* Creates a new branch for you automatically
* Fixes merge conflicts without changes

Solution
========
Force push replaces the remote state with your local state and can destroy others' changes.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
